meanings.def: a person who knows a lot about a particular subject because they have studied it in detail
examples: He was the most distinguished scholar in his field.
Literary scholars have argued about this matter for years.
She is the most distinguished scholar in her field.

meanings.def: a student who has been given a scholarship to study at a school, college or university
a clever person who works hard at school
examples: I was never much of a scholar.
